attributes.action: More chaos in the government. Call an immediate election after new pm appointed
attributes.additional_details: A general election will give the leader the support needed to calm the country down and stop a potential uprising or even civil war caused by the governments lack of care about running the country.
attributes.background: To call in an immediate general election to stop the constant uncertainty and instability of our country. Most of Uk civilians are worried whilst this government is playing musical chairs picking PMs that are causing more chaos.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
